title: New: Hannah Diamond – Pink & Blue
content:
There’s no way that you won’t hate the opening few seconds of this track from Hannah Diamond.

It’s almost offensively sugary, bubblegum pop, that would most likely have even the most ardent fans of Daphne & Celeste writhing in agony, yet there’s something about it, that makes the entire production so downright loveable. As Mr Neu points out, there’s a general feeling of deep-seated satire throughout, from the images that are just begging for Tumblr reblogging, to the connections/similarities to rising odd-pop producer SOPHIE, it’s nothing if not distinctive, and in it’s own manner, utterly brilliant. Check out Pink & Blue below, and then listen again, and again, and again….
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
